channel.title: Help With Error

item.title: Help With Error
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

Im trying to add


	public void Dclaws() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(25);
DC4Damg = 4;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(35);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
sM("You strike with the power of Dragon Claws!");
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
SpecDamg(25);
DC4Damg = 3;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecialDelay -= 1;
sM("You strike with the power of Dragon Claws!");
} [/code]

but it gives me an error where ever i put it

[code]client.java:2082: illegal start of expression
        public void harold()
        ^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Any Help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 12:34:40 pm[/size][hr]OMG CAN ANYONE HELP

Read full topic
